name: My recipes
body:
This is the repo for the recipes app I built in The Complete Rails Developer Course.
Feel free to sign up, test the app in production, and download your own recipes using the link below:
http://octorecipes.herokuapp.com/
![FoodStuffs](http://chefinyou.com/wp-content/themes/new_theme/images/bck/logo-icon.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
